article.title: Domains of pulsational instability of low-frequency modes in rotating upper main-sequence stars

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the parameter η represent in this figure?
choices: The effective temperature of the star.
The rotation frequency of the star.

multiple_choice_question.text: How does rotation affect the instability strip of dipole modes with m= -1?
choices: Shifts the strip towards lower masses and effective temperatures.
Shifts the strip towards higher masses and effective temperatures.
Does not significantly affect the strip.

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of modes are represented in this figure?
What does the oscillatory behavior of  ∆P  indicate?
choices: Presence of a chemical composition gradient above the convective core.

multiple_choice_question.text: This formula describes the period spacing for high-order g modes. What is a key assumption made in deriving this formula?
choices: The star has a non-uniform chemical composition.
The star has a convective core.
The star is not rotating and has a uniform chemical composition.
